mapper.select: select doctor.id as doctorId, doctor.avatar as doctorPhoto, doctor.doctor_name as doctorNamem, doctor.hospital as hospital, doctor.client_id as clientId, recv.create_time as recvTime from ( select * from t_doctor_referral_recv recv where recv.record_id = #{recordId} and recv.status in #{item} )recv join t_doctor_member doctor on doctor.id = recv.user_id and doctor.status = #{doctorStatus}
mapper.update: update t_doctor_referral_recv set status = #{newStatus}, last_update_time = #{lastUpdateTime} where user_id != #{userId} and status =#{oldStatus} and record_id = #{recordId}
